ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) i) The Information Management process (6.3.6), in its entirety, provides the information about the achievement of software assurance to the relevant stakeholders, including regulatory or approval authorities. The quantifiable information about the software is collected to support a set of arguments that justify a claim about the software assurance of a system. Due
